data.title: Certified Teachers for Online Live Teaching
data.meta_description: Experience Elevate K-12's positive effect on teaching, learning, & engagement! Our unique platform solves lack of qualified teachers. Learn more.
data.text:
Solve your teacher vacancy problem without sacrificing teaching quality.

Bring remarkable LIVE teaching into any classroom.

Trusted by:

Anchorage School District (AK) Aurora Public Schools (CO) Mount Diablo Unified School District (CA) Caddo Parish Public Schools (LA) KIPP Public Charter Schools (National) Grand Rapids Public Schools (MI) Milwaukee Public School District (WI) Sayreville School District (NJ) Charlotte-Mecklenburg Schools (NC) Berkeley County School District (SC) Douglas County School System (GA) Aldine ISD (TX)

It’s just like regular class.

Except it’s LIVE.

When a student enters a LIVE classroom, it feels just like a regular class. Teachers ask questions and kids raise their hands — see for yourself!

See how it works

How districts use

Elevate K-12

Address hard-to-fill roles, expand course offerings, or provide specialized attention to meet student needs.

Tier 1 Live

Special Education Live

Supplemental Live

Summer School Live

Choose from over 80 available LIVE courses across core, elective, and special ed

Explore courses available for Elementary, Middle School, and High School.

What our partners love about Elevate

Getting started is easy!

Request a consultation by filling out the form below.

You’ll meet with education consultants to discuss your needs.

We’ll send a customized proposal for your district.

❤ from our LIVE Classrooms

Districts, schools, and students say it works!

This has been our best year with Elevate K-12! Our Algebra 1 classes EOC scores had a 70% pass rate!

Berkeley County School District

South Carolina

I don’t have to worry about my Elevate classes because I know things are in good hands.

Memphis-Shelby County Schools

Tennessee

Elevate truly cares and seeks to do all that they can to help make virtual learning successful.

Bladen County School District

North Carolina

Elevate’s caring and experienced teachers go out of their way to motivate each student.

Maya Robinson

High School Director

Memphis-Shelby County, TN

I want more Elevate because I love my teacher. When I need help she explains it in a way just to help me.

7th Grade ELA Student

Marion County Public Schools

South Carolina

Elevate came through with flying colors and provided quality instruction from highly qualified teachers.

Lorraine Cruz

Principal

Chicago Public Schools, Illinois

Elevate’s highly trained and licensed educators build positive relationships with our students.

Michael Harris

Sr Director Talent Management

Milwaukee Public Schools, Wisconsin

My Elevate class is awesome and is probably my favorite class.

6th Grade Spanish I Student

South Bound Brook Public Schools, New Jersey

We LOVE our Elevate teacher and hope he is our instructor next year! He is so engaging and our kids are learning so much!

Paton-Churdan Community School District

Iowa

Elevate K-12 met a need so significantly. It was just such a blessing. Truly.

Natalie Priwer

Associate Principal of Curriculum Instruction

Willis ISD, Texas

Elevate K-12 has been a blessing for our school.

Charleston County School District

South Carolina

Everything is going well and great in my Elevate class. I love the care and support my teacher gives me.

11th Grade American Literature Student

Lancaster ISD, Texas

I love Elevate, it’s so amazing! The features are cool and I just love doing warm-ups. Everything is fun!

6th Grade ELA Student

This truly is LIVE teaching.

Keith Burton

Chief Academic Officer

Caddo Parish Public Schools, Louisiana

We’ve incorporated Elevate as part of our human capital strategy so we always have a plan for hard-to-fill positions

Superintendent
